title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector, the column icons do not show up.
EB: In the Available Items sector, when expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software and go to the Available Items sector.
2. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
